t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    n = int(input())
    ar = [x % 3 for x in [*map(int, input().split())]]
    (x, y) = (ar.count(1), ar.count(2))
    (x, y) = (min(x, y), max(x, y))
    res = 0
    while y >= x + 3:
        res += 1
        x += 2
        y -= 2
    (x, y) = (min(x, y), max(x, y))
    if y == x + 1:
        res += 2 if x else 6
    if y == x + 2:
        res += 4 if x > 1 or (x > 0 and x + y < n) else 5
    print(res + x)
